ValidationRule.description: When a case is set to 'Amber' or 'Red', the "Action Plan" field needs to be populated with an explanation.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(PSCase_Overall_Health__c , 'Red') , ISPICKVAL(PSCase_Overall_Health__c , 'Amber')), ISBLANK( Action_Plan__c ), IsClosed = FALSE, NOT($Profile.Id = '00e30000000bvR3') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please provide an action plan for any cases where the overall health is 'Amber' or 'Red'.
